1.content:
It's funny how much time passes, isn't it?

One day, I'm in the eighth grade, and the next thing I know, months later, today's the day I'm starting High School.

-

Anyway, the instant the bus stopped, we all got off of our seats and out of the bus. Now, I'm a bit short for a thirteen year old, considering I stand at about 4'9, so I had to watch my step without stumbling. Reaching into the pocket of my loose fit jeans (the waistband of my briefs actually peeked out a bit) , I pulled out my class schedule and unfolded it to look at the schedule.

Unfortunately, I wasn't looking where I was going, and accidentily bumped into someone.

"Hey!"

Realizing what I had done, I decided to apologize by looking up at the annoyed face of-
1.title: Day 1

11.content:
A girl wearing what appeared to be a red long-sleeved shirt with our high school's name and mascot, as well as a basketball on it, signifying her status as being one of the school basketball's members, more than likely the captian.

Appearance-wise, she had tanned skin, dark hair, and green eyes. As befitting someone who played basketball, not only did she have the necessary build for it, but she was TALL. Now, obviously, I'm shorter than girls either my age or older, but when I say she was tall, I mean it. And, considering that she appeared to be standing at a solid six feet six inches (when compared to my already meager four foot nine inch frame), I felt even smaller than unusual.

I was snapped out of my thoughts as I felt the back of my shirt collar being gripped firmly, but thankfully not too tightly, and immediately found myself leaving the ground as the tall girl easily lifted me up by the back of my shirt until our faces met so she could easily look me in the eye.

"Well?"

I flinched, the tone of her voice betraying her increased annoyance at my lack of response to her for bumping into her.

"If you're gonna say something, than do it.."

"I-I'm sorry for bumping into you!" I managed to squeak out to her; "I was just l-l-looking at my class schedule! I should've been paying attention to where I was going!"

The girl's expression softened a bit as she looked at me, as if she were studying me, if her eyes were of indication anyway.

"…You're a freshman, aren't you?"

I slowly nodded, effectively giving her my answer without having to add anything else.

Her face softened even more as she gave me a calmer expression; "You're forgiven.. Mind showing me your schedule?"

I lifted my right hand up, which held my schedule, and gave it to the girl. She read it, making sure that she thoroughly memorized every single last word on it. As soon as she finished reading it, she handed the schedule back to me.

"Seeing as it's your first day, I'll escort you to your class orientation...That all right with ya kid?"

"Uh.. Y-yeah, sure!"

The instant I said this though, rather than being put back on the ground and walking to the orientation alongside the girl as I was expecting, I found myself still being held in her grip by the scruff of my shirt. In fact, she not only shifted her arm's position so that I was facing the front, but it seemed that she was planning on carrying me like this the whole way there, whether I liked it or not. And from the way she was walking, she wouldn't have any problems doing this since it seemed like I didn't weigh a thing to her.

I felt a bit of a breeze on my mid-section, as the autumn wind blew against my exposed flat and skinny stomach. I shivered a bit, though it was nothing compared to the surrealness of the situation at the moment.

"Agh, where's my head at today?.. Name's Clarita, what's yours?" the girl asked me as she continued the escortation.

"Oh, uh.. My name's [Anon].." I said to her.

"Nice name y'got there.." She said with a grin.

We stopped as we soon saw the classroom, where my first class's orientation was to begin obviously.. Because the door was still open, and almost none of the other freshmen had arrived yet, it was obvious that we made it early. And seeing as we arrived at my destination, Clarita promptly lowered me down until I was back on the ground and released her grip on my shirt. She craned her neck down at me, signifying a brief conversation was at hand.

"Before you go in there [Anon], I got something to say so listen up.." The tall girl promptly put her left arm around my shoulders so that I'd stay put; "When your orientation's over, come and find me.. I'll be over at the basketball courts by the gymnasium waiting for you.."

"Why do you need me over there?" I asked her with a quizzical look on my face.

"It's just something we'll need to discuss in private chico.. Now, will you do as I say?" She asked, sounding more serious than usual.

"Y-yeah.." I nodded vigorously, not wanting to refuse the request of the 6'6 girl who's easily much stronger than me.

"Great t'hear!" Clarita exclaimed with mirth in her voice, with me blushing as she noogied me with her other hand; "Anyway, you might wanna get your butt in class, since you're early and all.. See you later kid.."

I nodded a bit as I hustled on over to the class, wondering exactly what she could POSSIBLY need to discuss with me later.
11.title: How's the weather up there?

choices: Clarita lifts me clear off the ground by my briefs.
111.content:
The very instant orientation was over, I walked out of the classroom with my hands in my pockets, wearing the blue jacket that I had stored in my backpack.. In hindsight, I should've been wearing the jacket from the beginning, though thankfully it was able to protect me from getting chills from the autumn wind.

After walking straight ahead for a little while, I saw the empty basketball courts breathing out a sigh of relief as I jogged over there, thankful that I hadn't been late, and stopped, standing underneath a basketball pole, where I awaited for the arrival of Clarita..

Only to feel a pair of hands blinding covering my eyes, making me jump a bit, feeling startled.

"Hey there squirt!"

I turned around almost immediately and looked up at the playful expression of the tall girl known as Clarita.

"Hiya!" I waved up to her, craning my neck upwards quite a bit so I could look at her face.

"Glad you could make it [Anon] !" She gently put her hands on my shoulders; "Now, you're probably wondering what the 411 is today.. Well.."

I raised an eyebrow, as I saw that she put on a more nervous expression.

"While you were in the class, I had to talk to a couple of teammates of mine and.. How does one say this.." She bit her bottom lip for a bit, then continued; "Apparently, there's this tradition where if the captain of the team bumps into a freshman.. I have to.. I.." She breathed in and out as she relaxed; "Um.. You might wanna turn around for this.."

I complied, not entirely sure what it was that she had to do.. That is, until I felt her slowly reach a single hand into my jeans and her fingers grip the waistband of my tighty whities.

"I'm really sorry about this.." She said to me with a sincere tone of voice; "You seem like a sweet kid.. But I basically have to wedgie you until next summer.."

"It's okay.." I said to her, knowing that she didn't really have a choice; "Just.. Please don't rip my underpants while you're pulling.."

"I'll try not to.." Clarita giggled a bit.
111.title: Later, at the basketball courts

"Cute briefs.." The tall girl said, as she kept me aloft.

12.title: One of the members of the football team

13.content:
A girl in a red cheerleader outfit, complete with the school's mascot on it. She stood about 5'7, with blazing red hair, green eyes, D-cups, and an athletic build.

"I'm sorry!" I squeaked out, backing away from her, only for the girl to grab me by the front of my shirt and lift me off the ground.

"Oh no you don't! You're not getting off that easy, I-" Suddenly, her face became less irritated and more curious; "You're a freshman, right?"

I slowly nodded, wondering why she asked me. What perplexed me even further though, was that she visibly gave a small smile as she put me downt; "Well, first of all, introductions.. I'm Valerie, head of the school cheerleaders.. and you are?"

"I-I'm [Anon].." I stamered, to which the girl then giggled.

"Well.. [Anon].. If you really want to make it up to me, just meet me at the gymnasium after orientation.. The girls and I will be waiting for you. Understand?"

I nodded, after which, the girl suddenly turned me around; "Better get going kid, don't wanna be late, do you?"

I hesitated for a moment, before running..
-

Sometime later, after orientation, I arrived at the gymnasium. Holding my breath, I opened the door, and went inside..

Little did I know what Valerie had in mind for me
13.title: Nothing like School Spirit

choices: Francine gets medieval on my underwear
131.content:
As I went inside, right in front of me, stood Valerie, who just smiled; "Y'made it on time, congrats! Now, you get to meet some of the girls~"

"What about the-"

"Others? Oh, they're now outside making sure our little meeting's kept private.."

She wrapped an arm around me as we walked towards a group of four other girls, all of them being both pretty and athletic.

"Hey girls, this is the kid I told you about, his name's [Anon]!"

One of the girls came up to me and pinched both of my face's cheeks; "Oh my gosh Val, he's so friggin' adorable~"

The other girls covered their mouths, giggling as I blushed, Valerie playfully shoved her away as she ruffled my hair; "Down girl, you'll have your fun with him later.."

Valerie soon started the introductions:

-

The first one (the same girl pinching me) was named Francine O'Bell. She stood around the same height as Valerie with her blonde hair in a braided up pony tail, and a pair of teal colored eyes.

The second girl was named Evelyn Slenwood. She had a bit more of a curvaceous build, lightly tanned skin, brown hair with a green streak dyed in, a pair of blue eyes, and stood around 5'8.

Sarah Tsunami, the shortest and third of the group (around 5'5) was more petite, had grey eyes, and had her black hair done in a pair of pigtails. From her last name alone, one could obviously guess she was of Japanese descent.

The tallest of the group was Sandy Rockheart (at 5'11), she had short curly black hair, chocolate brown eyes, dark skin (she was likely half black and half caucasian), and had the most muscular build.

-

"Now that we got introductions out of the way, let's discuss brass tacks.." Val gave a smile;"See, the school's cheerleading team started this recent tradition that started about 6 years ago, one so secret and so private that not even the principal knows about it."

"Which isn't saying much since he's always too busy to even notice.." Came Sarah's wisecrack.

"True.." Valerie rolled her eyes as she continued; "Now, this tradition goes like this: a freshman of the team's choosing has to essentially work for the team, and has to help with various chores.."

"Is that it?" I asked with a raised eyebrow, though I was relieved.

"Nope, there's more, so listen carefully squirt!" Evelyn said with laugh.

"See aside from the chores.. The team also has to do a special little ritual whenever the opportunity, which is also the team's initiation for the freshmen~" Francine said, stifling a giggle.

"Wh-what is it exactly?" I asked, anxiety rushing over me.

"Let me give you a hint.." Valerie went behind me and bent down to my level, as if she was goin to whisper in my ear..

Only for her to shoot her hands into the back of my jeans, and lift me off he ground, courtesy of my briefs. I could do nothing but let it all sink in, while squealing in pain..

And after a couple more moments passed..

"That's right shortstuff, you get to be the team's "Wedgie-Boy!'" Valerie said, briefly (no pun intended) bouncing me until Valerie released me, my underwear's waistband snapping against my lower back; "Now, since the initiation can't be completed until at least 5 girls have had a turn, captain included... Who wants to go next?"

An answer came in the form of a raised hand, courtesy of Francine, who then giddily sauntered over and walked behind me; "Sorry I have to ruin your undies sweetie, but it's tradition!" She lifted the back of my shirt up to get a look at my briefs; "Also, love how you wrote your name on the underwear tag, the handwriting's pretty fancy~"

I blushed even harder as the girls giggled at my expense again, and I soon grimaced, mentally preparing myself as Francine slowly and gently gripped my waistband after reaching into my pants.

A girl with black hair, dark looking clothes, and purple lipstick.. All of these, of course, signifying her status as a goth kid.

1452321.content:
Someone strangely familiar.

He was tall, and had short messy, bright red hair coming down just below his ears. His skin was quite pale and he had mesmerizing blue eyes. In fact his surprisingly androgynous face was quite... cute... Trying to push that thought away I allowed my eyes to scan over the rest of him. A black flight jacket that made him look like he was yanked straight from a punk concert covered a black t-shirt with some sort of logo I couldn't make out. And below that…A pair of dark red leggings?

"[Anon]?" Came a voice, obviously female, confirming her gender

A name stuck in my head, as I recognized the voice. "...Kylie?" I asked. Rather than an answer, I received a tight hug.

"Duuuuuude! It's been freakin' forever!" She exclaimed.

Kylie Houston. She had been one of my first friends in middle school, despite being a grade ahead of me, and I had even thought there was chance of us dating. Unfortunately about mid way through 6th grade her parents decided to enroll her in private school and that was the last I saw of her. I couldn't believe her new look. When I saw her last she was a blonde. Her hair was long and curly and best of all, we were close to the same height (around four feet four inches at the time) . Now, however.. She towered over me at a solid 6'1. I began cursing myself mentally at my measly four foot nine frame.

Getting over my shock at her changes I managed to speak, a sentimental smile forming itself on my face as I hugged my best friend. "Yeah Kylie. It really has."

I had hardly finished speaking before she started again. "We have sooo much catching up to do, maan." She paused as the bell rang. "Guess we gotta wait til class ends...unless... you wanna skip with me?"
1452321.title: Yes

14523212.content:
My expression changed to one where my eyes widened a bit as I replied in a hushed tone to her; "Y-you want to ditch school?!"

I knew Kylie was bold, especially during the times we hung out, but hearing her suggest such a thing just left me flabergasted, plain and simple.

"I-! You-" I stammered, trying to find the right words to put into a good sentence; "We can't just-"

Just as I was about finish my sentence, I heard her give out her familiar mirthful laugh. And within the blink of an eye, I felt something lift me upwards. As it turned out, Kylie had quickly wrapped an arm around my waist and hoisted me off the ground. She kept my feet from touching the floor, thanks to her keeping me securely tucked 'neath her arm. From how tight and wiry her arm felt, I could tell she had gotten both taller AND stronger, especially considering I didn't seem to weigh a thing to her.

"You shoulda seen the look on your face dude! You're still easy to rile up~" Kylie cheekily giggled as she gave me a noogie. I couldn't help but chuckle myself. She was still fun loving and mischievous, just like in middle school, and I wouldn't it want any other way.

She then gently took my schedule from my hand and looked at it; "Oh hey, our classes are next to each other!" Kylie, of course, proceeded to casually walk down the hall to where our classes were, while still carrying me under her arm no less.

As for me? I simply willed my body to relax and go limp, letting the tall girl carry me to our classes. All that was on my mind at the moment, was the fact that I reunited with one of the best friends I could ever ask for.

I knew one thing for sure.. From this day forth, that we'd never be far apart again.
14523212.title: Be a good kid

choices: Kylie carries me all the way to her place.
145232121.content:
Soon after we were let out, I saw Kylie, grinning in delight at seeing me.

I smiled back, jogging up to her, and allowing her to gently wrap an arm around my shoulders as we walked down the hallway.

"So how've you been, little buddy?" She asked me.

I held back a giggle at her nickname for me, seeing as we used to be close to the same height when we were younger (at 4'4 no less). "Eh, I guess I've been okay.." I said, looking up at her face. "Though, I missed you a lot.."

She tousled my hair. "Well, you're not gonna be worrying about that now. You're stuck with me, even after I graduate from this school in two years.." She said with a chuckle.

I beamed at her statement, knowing she was being truthful with her words. And while we were walking down the hallway, we double checked the schedule.. As it turned out, our other classes were close together.
---

Soon, after school had ended, we met up out front.

During lunch time, I had called my mom, and let her know that I ran into Kylie, and that the both of us would be hanging out at her place (it helped that today was a Friday, so we'd have plenty of time to catch up with each other during the weekend).

Once we put enough distance between ourselves and the school, Kylie craned her neck down to look at me.

"Say [Anon], you want me to carry you to my place?" Kylie asked me, "I mean, I kinda forgot to ask you the last time.. Plus, you're probably a bit tired, so I'm just trying to-"

"Sure, I don't mind.." I said to her.

"All right, good to hear.." Kylie said, as her grin became a bit more playful and mischievous. "Before I do that though, I have two words for you.."

"What's that?"

"Clench'em up.."

"Wha-Eek!" I felt myself being hoisted off the floor, but this time, it was due to Kylie lifting me up by the back of my jeans with one hand on it. This, predictably, hiked my britches up my crack and gave me quite the wedgie. My upper body leaned downwards while I was being lifted upwards, thus my rear end was sticking up in the air a bit (to my slight embarrassment) as I hung by my jeans in her grasp.

"You've improved a lot.." I chuckled weakly.

"You ain't whistling dixie, dude.." She said with an affectionate gleam in her eye as she smiled at me.

Even before she gained the height and strength she had now, Kylie was highly skilled in the art of wedgieing, as many a bully that attempted to harass me had found out.

While it was uncomfortable, I oddly didn't mind her carrying me like this .. Normally if it was anyone else, I'd probably be squirming and trying to get out, but this was Kylie.. I know she wasn't doing this to be mean or anything, just doing it out of her usual brand of playfulness..

Still.. I wasn't sure why, but I was honestly hoping that she'd do something like this more often

info.brief_description: Whoever says being a Freshman would be fun obviously doesn't know what he's talking about.
info.description:
Basically the premise of this is that you take control of a kid who just recently graduated from Middle School and is now Freshman in High School, all the while being told from a 1st person perspective.

Now, while he does have a set appearance, he's generally nameless. Seeing as I don't feel like giving him a name, I've come up with a solution..

Basically, whenever someone asks the character his name or something like that, just type this: [Anon].

And the rules, as always are simple:

1.) If you want to add anything to the story, make sure your grammar and spelling are legible

2.) Always have a proper paragraph structure (PLEASE no walls of text)

3.) Quotation marks are your friend, so use them when the characters are speaking.

4.) Girls are allowed to give wedgies, but they're not allowed to receive.

5.) Keep the content at a PG-13 level (No underaged sex, no fart or diaper fetishes, etc..)

6.) Be descriptive!

7.) Keep the focus on the wedgies

8.) When writing dialogue, make sure it feels natural.

9.) DON'T PLAGERIZE
~

Edit: 5/21

I need to get this out of the way...

Awhile back, I had a bit of an issue with someone writing one of the girl characters in this story getting wedgied. Naturally, he wanted me to make an exception for what he was writing, which he wrote as a note in one of chapters he worked on no less, despite knowing full well that what he was writing on in the chapters of this story completely went against the fourth rule.

This of course caused me to delete the chapters off the story, and for a good reason. The reason being, I do NOT want the majority of people following the rules I've laid out, only for me to do a 180 and make an exception for someone that doesn't like a rule that I set up (he said this to me via pm after I let him know I deleted what he wrote).

That would not be fair for any of you either reading or contributing to the story, since that would mean that I'm allowing someone to break a rule that everyone else knows that they're supposed to follow, which of course would be both hypocritical and showing favoritism.

Trust me, that would be a really crappy thing to do...
-

Oh, and to those who think they can get away with what that guy tried to do? Lemme make something especially clear to you.

If you like girls getting wedgies, that's fine. You can do that on another interactive story on this site.

But this story, as well as the others I've created, are meant to try and balance out the oversaturation of female wedgies in the wedgie community. My stories are also designed to get more wedgies with a female-giver/male-reciever set up, due to the relative lack of f/m wedgie content.

Trying to get me to make an exception to a rule that you know full well you're going against (and even doing so by leaving a note in a chapter) shows that you do not respect me or the reasons I have for the rules. Just because you don't like a rule, that doesn't mean you're entitled to be an exception to any rule that I set up.

In other words...


YOU ARE NOT ABOVE THE RULES
